Reference

BIGG

BIGG database

down_bigg_model()

Download BIGG model data

request_bigg_model_info()

Request BIGG model information

request_bigg_universal_metabolite_info()

Request BIGG universal metabolite information

request_bigg_universal_metabolite()

Request BIGG metabolite

request_bigg_universal_reaction_info()

Request BIGG universal reaction information

request_bigg_universal_reaction()

Request BIGG reaction

request_bigg_version()

Request BIGG version

FoodB

FoodB database

request_foodb_compound_info()

Request all the compound information in FoodB

request_foodb_compound()

Request one specific the compound information in FoodB

request_foodb_food_info()

Request all the food information in FoodB

Data

Some data embed in massdatabase

Other functions

Other usefull functions in massdatabase

massdatabase_logo()

Show the base information of massdatabase pacakge
